body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.84-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/74652 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** sdjisjdoinsjojsdoi@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Mac 26.1 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create an expense. 4. Go to Reports > Expenses. 5. Select the expense via checkbox. 6. Click dropdown button > Split. 7. Refresh the page. ## Expected Result: App will stay on Reports after refreshing Reports page with Split RHP opened. ## Actual Result: App opens Inbox after refreshing Reports page with Split RHP opened. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1ee2c2cf-5541-41c3-bfad-9f571eeef665 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: [$250] Company card - Can assign card feed which already assigned at first workspace for the second ws

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Help Wanted

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

labels.name: BZ Test Jan 26
labels.description: Lauren R running tests on removing BZ from certain parts in issue flows

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.82-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-2432/folder/13176706/41236862/1084294555 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** N/A **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Regression TC Execution **Device used:** Win 11/Chrome **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Create 2 workspaces setting currency USD - At each workspace, open Company cards page, click Add cards - US -Direct feed - Other - Wells Fargo - select Plaid credit card x3333 and complete add card flow - Navigate on Company cards of the first workspace, assign card for admin 1. Open https://staging.new.expensify.com 2. Navigate to Company card of the second workspace 3. Click on Assign card and assign card for admin 4. Click back button of "No active cards on this feed" screen 5. Click on Account - Troubleshoot and Clear cache and restart 6. Navigate to the second workspace setting 7. Click on Members tab and invite an employee 8. Click on Company cards tab 9. Click on Assign card and complete flow assign card for employee 10. After assigned card for employee successfully, unassigned card and assign card for admin ## Expected Result: "No active cards on this feed" screen should always display when assign card for admin or employee on the second workspace ## Actual Result: After clear cache and restart, I can assign card feed for employee on the second workspace. If assign card for admin, there's displayed error "This card has already been assigned to this member on a different feed" ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d4d698ed-da10-4933-b8a4-3efdf3913754 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.82-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/76067 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+khdjdjdjsjsk@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Samsung Galaxy S25 FE / Android 16 **App Component:** Search ## Action Performed: Precondition: - User has invited a phone number user with no display name. - User has added a direct card in Company cards page. - User has assigned a card with transactions to phone number user. 1. Launch Expensify app. 2. Go to Reports > Expenses. ## Expected Result: Expense row will not show user name with @expensify.sms. ## Actual Result: Expense row shows user name with @expensify.sms. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fa21cb20-9759-4879-b6c6-59f896b5ea29 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
